        public boolean addShape(TetrisShape shape,
                        int r,
                        int c)
        the method that add the shape
        Parameters:
        shape - the tetris shape
        r - the #row of the grid
        c - the #column of the grid
        Returns:
        true if the shape can be added, return false else

      • completeRow

        public int[] completeRow()
        create an int array and each index refer to each row set completed row to 1 and incompleted row to 0;
        Returns:
        an int array with completed row equal to 1
